description: The Musai, the first space warship specifically designed to carry mobile suits, is the mainstay of Zeon`s space fleet. It`s equipped with three mega particle cannon turrets and a battery of missile launchers, and its main deck can store three Zakus. The Komusai capsule stored in the Musai`s prow can be used as an atmospheric re-entry shuttle, with space for two more mobile suits. Char Aznable commands a modified Musai with a distinctive helmet-shaped bridge.
name: Musai
